title: Watching outdoors just got better with these new weatherproof Google TVs
summary: Sylvox launches weather-resistant 4K TV with a 95% screen-to-body ratio and Google TV 5.0 for year-round use.
body: TL;DR Sylvox announced its Frameless Outdoor TV series at CES 2026, featuring an ultra-slim frame up to 90% thinner than competing models. These televisions offer IP56-grade water and dust resistance, anti-glare displays of up to 2,000 nits brightness, and run on Google TV with Assistant voice control. Available from several retailers, including Amazon and Walmart, prices range from $1,599 for a 43-inch model to $4,299 for a larger size. At CES 2026 , we’ve seen the likes of Samsung and LG unveil the best of their TV tech, though most of it is geared for the living room. What if you want a clean TV experience outside the house? US-based company Sylvox is addressing this need with its new Frameless Outdoor TV series. Don’t want to miss the best from Android Authority ?
